review: It is a great device!  I'm pretty well hooked into Amazon so this device works great for me.I will say if you have Vudu or other files on a hard drive that wont display or audio on this device, you're stuck using your computer...no big deal for me but it might be for you.I will say the navigation is super easy....finding what you want is all there for ease of use.I converted from Ruku to this....and am very happy with my change.One thing I have found is it will hog your internet connection....I do not currently have a large throughput and when my Wi U turns on for an update, my Fire Tv doesnt like it and will take a significant amount of time to catch up.I have had to reboot mine a couple times due to this....the answer/solution is to NOT use Wifi connection to your router...instead, use a wired connection.  That solves the issue.Overall,  I highly recommend this device.
